overview: This is the true story of the most famous spy to ever love ‘em and leave ‘em. 007 can't get the job done like Mata Hari! He's on the trail of a woman capable of anything including: killing, betrayal, lies…and what story wouldn't be complete without sexual satisfaction!? This spy is working over time, getting pussy galore and it's all in the name (in this case) of getting the woman! Blowjobs, cunnilingus, anal penetrations and facial cum coatings are just some of the kinky tools employed by this raunchy cloak and dagger crew! A brilliant film that will keep you on the edge of your seat with the succession of scenes containing high erotic content.
title: Mata Hari
